scripts.db:dev: cd packages/database && pnpm dlx supabase@latest start
scripts.db:stop: cd packages/database && pnpm dlx supabase@latest stop
scripts.db:reset: cd packages/database && pnpm dlx supabase@latest db reset
scripts.db:status: cd packages/database && pnpm dlx supabase@latest status
scripts.db:types: cd packages/database && pnpm dlx supabase@latest gen types typescript --local > database.types.ts
scripts.db:migration:new: cd packages/database && pnpm dlx supabase@latest migration new
scripts.db:migration:up: cd packages/database && pnpm dlx supabase@latest migration up
scripts.db:migration:down: cd packages/database && pnpm dlx supabase@latest migration down
